press.title: Xovxwm
press.contactLine: Rau lus nug xovxwm, tiv tauj rau
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia yog ib lub app xa lus uas saib xyuas kev ntiag tug thiab pab sib tham txawv lus yooj yim. Cov lus muaj kev zais kawg-mus-kawg raws li lub neej ntawd, thiab muaj kev txhais lus 100+ hom lus hauv lub sijhawm tiag. Cov neeg siv tuaj yeem qhib lus ploj mus, khaws nyeem ntawv lees paub raws xaiv, thiab sync cuab yeej. Muaj nyob rau iOS, Android, thiab web.
press.scanTip: Nyob rau desktop? Xuas koj lub xov tooj los scan kom tau lub app.

careers.title: Ntawv haujlwm
careers.intro: Peb yog ib pab me tabtom tsim ib lub messenger ntiag tug thiab thoob ntiaj teb. Yog koj saib xyuas kev zais lus, kev nkag tau siv, thiab UX zoo siab, peb xav hnov los ntawm koj.
careers.openRoles: Chaw ua haujlwm qhib: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Yuav ua li cas thov: Email koj daim resume/links rau jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Hais Txog Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia yog ib lub messenger ruaj ntseg, ntau hom lus, nrog kev zais lus kawg-mus-kawg, kev txhais lus tam sim, thiab hu/yeej video. Peb lub hom phiaj yooj yim: pab tib neeg txuas lus‚Äînyob ruaj ntseg, ntiag tug, thiab thoob cov lus.

values.control: <bold>Tswj tau:</bold> Lus ploj mus & nyeem ntawv lees paub yog xaiv xwb.

advertise.title: Tso tshaj tawm nrog Chatforia
advertise.description: Mus cuag cov neeg siv xa lus nquag nrog kev tso tshaj tawm zoo nkauj thiab nyab xeeb. Peb muaj banners, kev txhawb nqa, thiab house promos. Cov neeg siv Premium tsis pom ads.

account.q: Kuv tsim lossis rov qab tau kuv account li cas?
account.a: Download lub app lossis siv web, nias ‚ÄúCreate account‚Äù, txheeb xyuas koj email/xov tooj. Rov qab, siv ‚ÄúForgot password‚Äù.

privacy.q: Puav leej cov lus muaj zais kawg-mus-kawg?
privacy.a: Yog lawm. Cov lus thiab kev hu muaj kev zais kawg-mus-kawg raws li lub neej ntawd. Tsuas yog koj thiab tus txais thiaj nyeem tau.

translate.q: Kev txhais lus tam sim ua haujlwm li cas?
translate.a: Qhib ‚ÄúAuto-translate‚Äù hauv Settings ‚Üí Appearance & Language. Peb txhais hauv-cuab-yeej yog muaj, tsis xav tau ces siv APIs uas muaj kev ruaj ntseg nrog metadata tsawg kawg nkaus.

contact.a: Tiv tauj peb hauv support@chatforia.com. Ntxiv screenshots thiab koj qhov version app.

contact.title: Tiv tauj Peb
contact.successMsg: Ua tsaug‚Äîpeb pab neeg yuav teb los ntawm email.
contact.errorSend: Tsis xa tau. Thov email rau support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Kev Cai Ntiag Tug no piav qhia tias Chatforia (‚Äúpeb‚Äù) sau, siv, thiab faib ntaub ntawv li cas thaum koj siv peb cov app thiab kev pab. Peb tsim Chatforia kom txo yam peb pom tau.

infoWeCollect.title: Ntaub ntawv peb sau
infoWeCollect.account: Ntaub ntawv account (piv txwv, email/xov tooj) rau tsim thiab ruaj ntseg account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Cov ntsiab lus uas muab zais (lus/hu) yog E2E; peb tsis nyeem tau.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Kev kuaj yuam kev/kev siv xws li crash logs, hom cuab yeej, lossis kev txheeb cais me me los txhim kho kev ua haujlwm.

howWeUse.title: Peb siv ntaub ntawv li cas
howWeUse.provide: Muab thiab ruaj ntseg kev pab (auth, nrhiav spam/abuse).
howWeUse.improve: Txhim kho nta (qhov zoo ntawm txhais lus, kev ntseeg siab).

sharing.title: Kev faib
sharing.body: Peb tsis muag ntaub ntawv tus kheej. Peb yuav faib me ntsis nrog cov tuam txhab pab (piv txwv, push notifications, analytics) raws li cov ntawv cog lus nruj.

rights.title: Koj txoj cai
rights.body: Nyob ntawm koj thaj tsam (piv txwv, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), koj yuav thov saib, kho, rho tawm, lossis tsis kam qee yam txheej txheem. Tiv tauj: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kev khaws cia & kev ruaj ntseg
retention.body: Peb tsuas khaws yam tseem ceeb rau kev khiav haujlwm thiab siv kev ruaj ntseg raws kev lag luam. E2E cov ntsiab lus peb tsis qhib tau.

children.title: Menyuam yaus
children.body: Chatforia tsis tsim rau menyuam hnub nyoog qis dua 13 (lossis raws li koj txoj cai hauv zos).

changes.title: Kev hloov
changes.body: Peb yuav tso tawm xov tshiab ntawm no thiab hloov ‚ÄúHloov kho zaum kawg‚Äù hnub.

intro.body: Thaum siv Chatforia ces koj pom zoo rau cov Cai no. Yog tsis pom zoo, thov tsis txhob siv qhov kev pab.

acceptableUse.title: Kev siv kom haum
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Tsis pub muaj yam txhaum cai, ua phem, lossis xws li txhaum cai; tsis pub spam lossis kev siv tshuab rov ua dua.

yourContent.title: Koj cov ntsiab lus
yourContent.body: Koj tseem khaws cai ntawm koj cov ntsiab lus. Koj pub peb siv yam tsim nyog kom khiav tau kev pab (piv txwv, xa, cia, txhais lus).

disclaimer.title: Kev tshem txim & lub luag hauj lwm
disclaimer.body: Kev pab muab ‚Äúraws li nws yog‚Äù yam tsis muaj kev lav. Ntawm qhov ntau tshaj uas kev cai pub, Chatforia tsis ris lub luag hauj lwm rau kev puas tsuaj txuas ntxiv/ntiav.

changes.title: Kev hloov
changes.body: Peb yuav hloov kho cov cai no; siv txuas ntxiv tom qab hloov txhais tau tias koj pom zoo.

contact.title: Tiv tauj

doNotSell.body: Chatforia tsis muag ntaub ntawv tus kheej. Cov neeg nyob California tseem yuav xa qhov kev thov raws CPRA siv khawm hauv qab.

cookies.title: Kev Teeb Tsa Ncuav Qab Zib
cookies.body: Chatforia siv ncuav qab zib tsawg kawg nkaus (piv txwv, session, kev ruaj ntseg). Peb tsis siv ncuav qab zib tshaj tawm ntawm lwm tus. Tswj ncuav qab zib hauv koj lub browser.
